fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 344.99 lakh crore compared with Rs 166.39 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 129 points or 0.74% to settle at 17,321.90. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 0.19% to 12.97. Adani Enterprises, Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
